---
category: news
title: "Trigger a run of a Machine Learning pipeline from a Logic App"
excerpt: "Trigger the run of your Azure Machine Learning Pipeline when new data appears. For example, you may want to trigger the pipeline to train a new model when new data appears in the blob storage account. Set up the trigger with Azure Logic Apps. An Azure Machine Learning workspace. For more information, see Create an Azure Machine Learning workspace."
